text: "Sweet Freedom" is a 1986 song by Michael McDonald. It was taken from his compilation album Sweet Freedom and from the 1986 movie Running Scared. It went to number 12 in the United Kingdom, number 7 in the United States and number 14 in Canada. ==References== Category:1986 songs Category:Michael McDonald (musician) songs Category:Blue-eyed soul songs Category:Dance-pop songs
title: Sweet Freedom (song)
